definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Objective:To make clear of the composition of gangue-combustion fly ash under 70μm and benefit its comprehensive utilization.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解矸石电厂粉煤灰的组成，指导其综合利用。

sentences.english: The discharge system for the belt conveyance of the waste rock in the mine well solves these problems.
sentences.chinese: 矿内输送带运输矸石排放系统有效地解决了这些难题。

sentences.english: Temperature is the main factor to influence the coal residue pyrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 热解温度是影响煤矸石热解反应最主要的因素。

sentences.english: Burning waste heap is one of the major air pollution sources in. coalmine areas.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿自燃矸石山是矿区一大污染源。

sentences.english: After burning the flat coal waste rock pile of the heavy metals pollution levels for light pollution.
sentences.chinese: 经过燃烧的平排矸石山重金属污染等级为轻污染。

sentences.english: The environmental management of coal waste has become an impending problem.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石的环境治理问题已成当务之急。

sentences.english: Both coal gangue and coal bed methane are low heating value fuels.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石和含甲烷量较低的煤层气均属于低热值的燃料。

sentences.english: Burning waste heap is one of the major air pollution sources in.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿自燃矸石山是矿区一大污染源。

sentences.english: The foreground for the research on the resources utilizations of coal gangues is very great.
sentences.chinese: 变废为宝，开展煤矸石资源化利用研究前景广阔。

sentences.english: Spray explosion of gangue hill is a common calamity in coal mine.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿矸石山喷爆，是煤矿生产中常见的一种灾害。

sentences.english: The fact that coal mine refuse of Yongcheng is sandy mudstone was confirmed by XRD.
sentences.chinese: 经XRD证实永城煤矸石是砂质泥岩。

sentences.english: The kind of admixed coal gangue bas influence on the property of cement hydration.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石种类对水化性能有影响。

sentences.english: In the waste dump, the Abstract is linked with the winch working Laoqin drivers turn waste rock.
sentences.chinese: 在矸石山下，摘挂工老秦正配合着绞车司机在翻矸石。

sentences.english: The waste rocks are mucked out every day.
The destruct height of overlying strata is linearly correlation with the compression rate of gangue backfilling.
sentences.chinese: 覆岩破坏高度和矸石充填体压缩率成正线性相关。

definition: mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
